name: Charles Harper Webb
bio: Charles Harper Webb’s latest books are A Million MFAs Are Not Enough (2016, Red Hen Press), Brain Camp (2015, University of Pittsburgh Press), and What Things Are Made Of (2013, University of Pittsburgh Press). He earned a BA in English from Rice University, an MA in English from the University of Washington, and an MFA in professional writing and a PhD in counseling psychology from USC. He teaches at California State University, Long Beach.
